item.title: Windows Applications
item.description: Communication Slack Skype Ring Editors Sublime Text Atom Games Steam Uplay Windowed Borderless Gaming Cloud Storage Dropbox Yandex Disk Music Spotify Browsers Chrome Firefox Administration TeamViewer - the All-In-One Software for Remote Support and Online Meetings.
